Shipping Jamf Webhooks with Fivetran https://t-lark.github.io/posts/shipping-jamf-webhooks/ Sat, 19 Sep 2020 21:27:27 -0700 Author https://t-lark.github.io/posts/shipping-jamf-webhooks/ Shipping Jamf Pro Webhooks to Snowflake Jamf Pro has a builtin feature where you have the ability to ship a webhook event when specific events happen in their application. This allows for a near real time feed of event based data which you can consume and leverage to gain insights about your fleet. Jamf provides some documentation online, found here. Webhooks are generated automatically, and near instantly when an event occurs.
